A .gen.md file has been detected. This is a generative markdown configuration file.

## Quick Reference

**Frontmatter fields:**
- `name` - Human-readable identifier
- `description` - What this generator produces
- `context` - Files to include as context
- `skills` - Skills to apply
- `output` - Target output file

**Available commands:**
- `/gen-md [file]` - Generate output
- `/gen-md-validate [files...]` - Validate configuration
- `/gen-md-cascade [file]` - View cascade chain
- `/gen-md-prompt [file]` - Generate conversational prompt

## Cascade Resolution

This file inherits from parent `.gen.md` files in ancestor directories.
Use `/gen-md-cascade` to see the full inheritance chain.
